name: Home Depot Military Discount
description: 10% off up to $400/year on select home improvement purchases
fullDescription: Home Depot offers a 10% military discount on select in-store purchases for active duty, veterans, retirees, and eligible dependents, with a $400 annual maximum.
whatTheyOffer:
- 10% off select in-stock purchases
- $400 maximum annual discount (resets each calendar year)
- Tax-free shopping through military exchanges (expanded May 2025)
- Available in-store and online
- Virtual ID on Home Depot app for easy checkout
howToGetIt:
1. Download The Home Depot app or visit homedepot.com/military
2. Create account and verify military status through SheerID
3. Eligible: active duty, veterans, retirees, DoD civilians, spouses
4. Scan Virtual ID at register or enter phone number
5. Physical military IDs no longer accepted at register
keywords: Home Depot, military discount, veteran, active duty, 10% off, home improvement, tools, hardware, SheerID
